description: Number of 2n X 2n matrices whose entries are {0,-1,+1} and whose row sums and column sums are all distinct.
comments: Matrices differing by taking transpose, multiplying by -1 and permuting rows and columns are regarded as equivalent.
references: It is known (see references) that a (2n+1) X (2n+1) matrix of this form cannot exist.

Rainer Bodendiek, Gustav Burosch; Streifz"uge durch die Kombinatorik, Aufgaben und L"osungen aus dem Schatz der Mathematik-Olympiaden, (Excursions into Combinatorics) Spektrum Akademischer Verlag, Heidelberg, 1995, ISBN 3-86025-393-X Kapitel: Aufgaben zu Invarianten, Aufgabe 5.30, pp. 250-253.
